sentences: Chris Peterson (born May 14, 1968) is a Canadian producer and electronic musician from Vancouver, British Columbia.

sentences: Throughout his career he has worked with numerous bands in the Canadian industrial and electronic music scene of which Front Line Assembly and Delerium are the most notable.
